nodes.text: The Tagra-Tel were a culture descended from the Tangrada-Nii near the Oridol Cluster. While their ancestors believed the star cluster was a god, the Tagra-Tel sent starships into the cluster over a number of centuries, and instead came to believe that it was a living creature after experiencing paranormal activity. Some weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Palal Seedia, a pilot in the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, told the New Republic pilot Wyl Lark about the Tagra-Tel's endeavours with the Oridol Cluster, over a comm channel while both pilots were in the star cluster itself.
The Tagra-Tel were mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
